[`func index(Self.Index, offsetBy: Int, limitedBy: Self.Index) -> Self.Index?`](/documentation/swift/lazysequence/index(_:offsetby:limitedby:)-617va)Returns an index that is the specified distance from the given index, unless that distance is beyond a given limiting index.
